reg:regulation.reg:title: Vehicle Inspection Regulation
reg:regulation.reg:amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 24/2018, March 1, 2018]

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The standards, criteria and guidelines in the attached Schedule entitled "Vehicle Inspection Manual" are established for the purposes of section 216 of the Motor Vehicle Act.

The requirements and guidelines in the attached Schedule entitled "Vehicle Inspection Manual" relating to equipment that must be kept at the facility are set out for the purposes of section 216 of the Motor Vehicle Act.

bcl:lefttext.in:em: The Schedule is exempt from publication and may be viewed during regular office hours at the following address:

bcl:schedule.bcl:indent1:
Commercial Vehicle Safety and Enforcement Branch
Ministry of Transportation and Infrastructure
3A - 940 Blanshard Street
Victoria BC V8W 2H3
